page.title: 13 Weaverthorpe Holidays
page.content: Most people manage a{holiday}away from home. Families with young children often use{holiday camps,}mostly self -catering, e.g. at Great Yarmouth, Minehead, Ayr, Filey, in caravans or chalets. Many families stay with friends and relations and a few families go on {package tours}at{home and abroad.} Several children have been to Malta, Minorca, Yugoslavia or Spain, and amongst adults, Spain is favourite. One family has{camped}in France, Germany, Norway, Belgium and Austria. Jerusalem, Paris, Moscow, Denmark, Corfu, Tenerife, U.S.A and Canada are other places visited by villagers. Members of 2 families have visited brothers living in New Zealand and Australia. The school often uses{Youth Hostels.
